metadata.name: Heroez #00001
metadata.description:
Heroez is the first professional esport team 100% governed by its own community 🎮

Our vision is to reshape the esport industry by putting the fans at the center of all the team’s decisions.

We give an active ownership in the organization (a DAO) 🤖

We refocus, and share value created with the community 💥

We propose unique and immersive experiences in the metaverse for the gamers and esport fans 💫​

___

🔍 To learn more about Heroez, follow the various links on the collection page and join our discord.

___

📜 By owning this token, you agree with our [terms and conditions](https://heroez.gg/terms-and-conditions).
